markdownRemark.html:
This is NOT the latest release. The latest release can be found via the repository listing.

This release is for the Authn Simple package, which forms part of the ICAT suit of software.

Citation

When referencing this software release please use the following citation:

Collaboration, T. I. C. A. T. (2015). The ICAT Project: authn.simple version 1.0.0. The ICAT Collaboration. https://doi.org/10.5286/SOFTWARE/ICAT/AUTHN.SIMPLE/1.0.0

Software

Authn Simple software version 1.0.0 can be accessed from the ICAT Maven site.
